maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/223/s.text: Je vois que vous avez obtenu le \c[3]Symbole de Glace Bleue\c[0] !

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/223/s.orig: You can now take the Laser Rails to reach \c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]!
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/223/s.text: Vous pouvez maintenant prendre les Rails Lasers pour atteindre la \c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0] !

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/223/s.orig: Dear Seeker, you seem rather confused. Do you wish to pass this barrier?
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/223/s.text: Cher \v[lore.title.seeker], vous semblez confus. Voulez-vous passer cette barrière ?

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/223/s.orig: In that case, you need to obtain the \c[3]\v[item.225.name]\c[0].
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/223/s.text: Dans ce cas, vous avez besoin d'obtenir le \c[3]Symbole de Glace Bleue\c[0].

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/223/s.orig: It is given to anyone who completes the \c[0]\v[area.cold-dng.name]\c[0].
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/223/s.text: Il est donné à tous ceux qui finissent le \c[3]\v[area.cold-dng.name]\c[0].

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/223/s.orig: What is it? Did you already beat the challenge?
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/223/s.text: Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ? Tu as déjà réussi le challenge ?

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/223/s.orig: Well then, maybe you just \c[3]missed the treasure chest\c[0] in the room of your final opponent!
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/223/s.text: Hm... Peut-être que tu as \c[3]zappé le coffre au trésor\c[0] dans la pièce de l'ennemi final !

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: Hi!
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: Salut !
... Salut ?

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: Ah! H-\.Hello!
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: Ah ! B-\.Bonjour !

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: Sorry, I just went blank there for a second.
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: Désolé, j'étais perdu dans mes pensées.
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.note: might be too spoily for this traitor, was just surprised lea could speak

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: I'm \c[3]C'tron\c[0], the other member of the First Scholars.
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: Je suis \c[3]C'tron\c[0], l'autre membre des Premiers Érudits.

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: Lin just gave me your contact and told me to say hello.
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: Lin m'a donné ton contact et m'a demandé de te dire bonjour.

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: So...\. nice to meet you!
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: Donc...\. Ravi de te rencontrer !

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: Ah, d-don't worry! They told me about your limited speech problem.
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: Ah, n-ne t'inquiète pas ! Ils m'ont dit pour le problème avec ton module vocal.

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: So...\. you really are as \c[1]over-leveled\c[0] as they told me.
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: Donc...\. tu as vraiment un \c[1]niveau super élevé\c[0], comme les autres me disaient.

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: But I also heard you play with other low-level people.
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: J'ai aussi entendu que tu joues avec des gens de niveau plus faible.

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: But yes, we seem to be about the same level!
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: Oh, on a l'air d'être au même niveau !

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: So...\. I could join your party, right?
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: Donc... Je pourrais rejoindre ton groupe, non ?

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: Anyway, I'm still busy today...
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: Bon, là aujourd'hui je suis déjà occupé...

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: But if you don't mind, I'd gladly join tomorrow!
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: Mais si tu n'as rien contre, demain je pourrais te rejoindre !

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: Would that be okay?
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: Ça t'irais ?

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: Okey-dokey!
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: Dacodac !

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: W-Well then, see you tomorrow, Lea!
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: B-Bon alors, à demain, Lea !

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: Bye!
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: Bye !

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: Oh, so it looks like you might soon have a party of 3.
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: Oh, on dirait que tu auras bientôt un groupe de 3.

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: Very nice.
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: Très bien.

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.orig: That boy seems to be a \c[3]Hexacast\c[0]. They are very useful to have in a party.
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/225/s.text: Ce jeune a l'air de jouer un \c[3]Hexacast\c[0]. Ils sont très utiles dans un groupe.

maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/226/s.orig: Hm... I think you should head to the \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0] first, correct?
maps/bergen/elevator.json/entities/226/s.text: Hm... Tu devais pas aller au \c[3]QG des Premiers Érudits\c[0] avant ?
